title: Like Father Like Son
overview: Dee Stanton's career is blossoming and her boyfriend Dominic unexpectedly proposes to her. Things were very different some years ago when her husband Paul was jailed for the brutal murders of four girls and Dee was hounded from her home. Dee has kept all this a secret from her 15-year-old son Jamie. Now he has discovered the truth about his father and demands to see him.
